aboutMeDescription: I love problem solving. As a strong analytical thinker it's in my DNA to take on new tasks and not rest until the desired outcome is achieved. Always learning new things and striving for excellence.
aboutMeLetsConnect: Let's connect and create something amazing together.
contactInfo: I'm looking for exciting projects or a role where I can contribute and grow. If you need someone who develops with precision and innovation, let's connect!
continuousLearning: As an open-minded person I am keen to learn new technologies and improve my soft and coding skills.
otherSkillInfo: Learning new things is my favourite hobby!
portfolioInfo: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
problemSolving: My key strengths are creative approaches and persistence. If I hit a wall I'm eager to break it.
processDataText: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
skillsDescription: Throughout my journey, I've been able to work on mutliple projects and deepen my understanding of front-end technologies. For me, learning new things is essential to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.
workLocation: Since I'm located in Munich, my work is primarily done from here. I am also open to work remotly or relocate!
portfolioEPL: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolioJoin: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolioPoke: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
portfolioDaBubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
referenceAnja: Leon is ambitious and learns new things really quickly. When he takes on a topic, he works with focus and finds solutions fast. He thinks logically, approaches problems in a structured way, and always contributes great ideas. You can clearly see that he enjoys developing himself further.
referenceDennis: Leon really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
referenceDaniel: Leon was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.
general_info_text: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you. For detailed information on data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below this text.
data_responsible: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
data_responsible_text: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the "Information about the responsible party" section of this privacy policy.
data_how_collected: How do we collect your data?
data_how_collected_text: Your data is collected in part by you providing it to us. For example, this can include data that you enter into a contact form. Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website through our IT systems. These are primarily technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page access). The collection of this data occurs automatically as soon as you enter this website.
data_usage: What do we use your data for?
data_usage_text: Some data is collected to ensure the error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze user behavior.
data_rights: What rights do you have regarding your data?
data_rights_text: You have the right to request free information about the origin, recipients, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent for data processing, you can withdraw this consent at any time for the future. Additionally, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. Furthermore, you have the right to file a complaint with the relevant supervisory authority. For this and other questions regarding data protection, you can contact us at any time.
hosting_provider_text: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, owned by René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf. For details, please refer to the privacy policy of All-Inkl. The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in providing the most reliable display of our website. If consent is requested, processing will take place exclusively based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR and § 25 para. 1 TDDG. Consent can be withdrawn at any time.
legal_basis: General information about the legal basis for data processing
legal_basis_text: Processing is carried out according to Art. 6 GDPR (various legal bases, depending on the case). For further details, please refer to the complete privacy policy.
storage_duration_text: Unless a more specific storage duration is mentioned within this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose of processing the data no longer applies. If you assert a legitimate request for deletion or withdraw consent for data processing, your data will be deleted.
google_fonts_text: This site uses Google Fonts, provided by Google, for uniform font display. The Google Fonts are installed locally. No connection to Google servers takes place.
